summary: The customer was having trouble with their new Contoso Wireless TV, where it would not turn on. The agent asked the customer for more information and checked the customer's account to make sure there were no issues that could be causing the problem. After confirming that the power cord was securely plugged in, the agent suggested resetting the TV by unplugging and plugging back in the power cord, and pressing and holding the power button for 10 seconds. This resolved the issue and the customer was able to use their TV.
